member.name: T:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesBaseClass
member.summary: This class can be used as a base class for classes that process a file or files, and create new output files in an output folder. Note that this class contains simple error codes that can be set from any derived classes. The derived classes can also set their own local error codes
member.remarks: Written by Matthew Monroe for the Department of Energy (PNNL, Richland, WA) Copyright 2005, Battelle Memorial Institute. All Rights Reserved. Started November 9, 2003

member.name: P:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesBaseClass.IgnoreErrorsWhenUsingWildcardMatching
member.summary: This option applies when processing files matched with a wildcard

member.name: T:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesOrFoldersBase
member.summary: This class contains functions used by both clsProcessFilesBaseClass and clsProcessFoldersBaseClass
member.remarks: Written by Matthew Monroe for the Department of Energy (PNNL, Richland, WA) Created in October 2013 Last updated in November 2013

member.name: F:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesOrFoldersBase.mLogDataCache
member.summary: Keys in this dictionary are the log type and message (separated by an underscore), values are the most recent time the string was logged

member.name: M:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesOrFoldersBase.CreateSettingsFileIfMissing(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified .XML settings file exists in the user's local settings folder

member.name: M:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesOrFoldersBase.CreateSettingsFileIfMissing(System.String)
member.summary: Verifies that the specified .XML settings file exists in the user's local settings folder
member.param: Full path to the local settings file, for example C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming\AppName\SettingsFileName.xml

member.name: M:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesOrFoldersBase.GetAppDataFolderPath(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the full path to the folder into which this application should read/write settings file information

member.name: M:MASICResultsMerger.clsProcessFilesOrFoldersBase.GetAppFolderPath
member.summary: Returns the full path to the folder that contains the currently executing .Exe or .Dll

member.summary: Returns the .NET assembly version followed by the program date
